respondent was assigned a value of UADBUND=3 if they did not use alcohol in the past month, were aged 21 or older, were past month alcohol
users who were under 21 and bought it at a store, restaurant, bar, club, or event, were past month alcohol users who were under 21 but did not pay
for their most recent alcohol, or were past month alcohol users who were under 21 and paid for their most recent alcohol but did not buy it
Len : 1    RC-AGE PERSON WHO PURCHASED ALC FOR UNDERAGE DRINKER
respondent was assigned a value of UADCAG=5 if they did not use alcohol in the past month, were aged 21 or older, were past month alcohol
users who were under 21 but did not pay for their most recent alcohol, or were past month alcohol users who were under 21 but bought it
Len : 1    RC-WHO PURCHASED UNDERAGE DRINKER MOST RECENT ALCOHOL
2 = Another Family Member Aged 21 or Older (CAGVWHO=2) ......................................
3 = Someone Not Related Aged 21 or Older (CAGVWHO=3)...........................................
he following variable, UADFWHO, was assigned missing if a respondent indicated that some other person gave them the last alcohol they drank
(CAFREWHO=7) and their response to the other-specify follow-up question was unknown (CAFRESP2=70, 85, 94, 97, 98) or if they did not
indicate who gave them the last alcohol they drank (CAFREWHO=85, 94, 97, 98). A respondent was assigned a value of UADFWHO=8 if they did
not use alcohol in the past month, were aged 21 or older, or were past month alcohol users who were under 21 but paid for it themselves
